name: Dear Son
description:
Story:

Dear Son, 

Dad is dying. He's got some sort of virus that can only be cured with 10 magic hearts, 10 frozen hearts, and 10 fire hearts. It is a dangerous and long  journey, but unfortunately, that's the only way. If you're up for it, be careful, we love you.

Mom.

Description: 

Dear Son is a fun puzzle platformer with a unique mechanic, trial and error is the only thing you'll need. With an awesome story behind it together with beautiful music and simple graphics, you will experience the most magical thing ever!

Features:
  • Charming Graphics
  • Fun and easy to master mechanic
  • Beautiful story
  • Lovely music
  • Level Editor
  • Engaging Gameplay
  • Multiple Chapters
  • Level Difficulty Option

Music: Da Game Company · Dear Son Complete Soundtrack - Leonardo Sobrepeña
